Key Match Events: England chased 142 to win with 13 required from the final 12 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler expressed delight for Ben Stokes after his crucial performance
Ben Stokes provided a sense of calm when England needed it most
Dawid Malan is a doubt after pulling up sharply while chasing the ball
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wanindu Hasaranga, Dhananjaya de Silva, and Maheesh Theekshana stifled the scoring with just 69 runs conceded across 12 overs of spin
Adil Rashid took 4 wickets for 16 runs while Mark Wood took 3 wickets for 26 runs
